data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Some young children spend a lot of time practicing sports. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this."
data.answer: Some of the young generations are sporty, and they would spend a huge amount of time practicing sports. This behavior has brought the sporty children healthy lifestyles and fit bodies. A large number of physical exercises can train their muscles regularly and enhance their muscle strengths. By doing a lot of sports, children can also protect their eyesight by looking at a longer distance and shifting eye focus by tracking the ball trajectory. However, there also exist some drawbacks associated with practicing sports too often. Humans have limited essence and energy, if young children spend too much time practicing, they may get over-exhausted, and the tiredness may lead to an unexpected injury.
